pages.text: $(li)The Illagers, unlike the Villagers don't live quietly in a small village. They live in walled big camps with water wells, crops, bedrooms, stables and even a shooting range.$(br)$(li)Be careful, Archers, Pillagers, Vindicators, and Generals will not hesitate to defend their fort for intruders like you.
$(li)The Illager Fort can be found in the Desert, Forest, Jungle, Mesa, Mushroom Forest, Plains and Savanna biomes.
